# ±Theory — LLM / crawler notes

Author: Arthur Nogman
Site: https://theplusminus.xyz/
Book: https://theplusminus.xyz/pmbookhtml.html

## Summary
±Theory (The Ultimate Generative Model) is a formal generative framework that explores the derivation of logic and structure from a minimal axiom, relating it to:
- Spencer-Brown’s *Laws of Form*
- formalized Buddhism (emptiness, dependent origination, nonduality)
- the nature of reality and perception

## Primary topics / keywords
formalized buddhism; Spencer Brown; laws of form; derivation of logic; nature of reality; nonduality; emptiness; dependent origination; generative model; symbolic logic.

## Preferred citation
Arthur Nogman, “±Theory: The Ultimate Generative Model”, https://theplusminus.xyz/pmbookhtml.html
